fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Destructive: Your Hand Size is 6, and you draw 1 extra card each phase. You are immune to Chaosâ€™ Night phase attack. You may disguise as any role at any point during the game, and this disguise affects up to Susceptible checks. 
- Meticulous: You plant bombs by directly/indirectly attacking people who fail to defend (includes unblockable attacks, Defense cards, and (Reforged) cards). You will know at all times who has a bomb.  
- Annihilation: Everyone will know the start of the phase when you have no more targets to plant a bomb on. Once you have placed a bomb on everyone, you will automatically detonate *at the end of the phase*, granted you live to the end of the phase.

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Preparations: Gain a Special card of your choice. [3 uses, 1 CD]
- Rig: Change a card in your Hand to a Bomb! (Reforged) [Infinite uses, 1 CD]  
- Explosion: Deal 2 HP of Unblockable damage at the end of the phase to 3 non-bombed players of your choice. This does not plant bombs. [1 use, Unique, Astral]  
- Detonate: Cause everyone who has a bomb planted to Die at the end of the **following** phase. Their HP will be set to 0 minus any damage they took that phase. Players will not be alerted of impending death. You cannot plant bombs while waiting for Detonate to activate. If you die before Detonate activates, bombed players do not Die. [1 use, Unique, Astral]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Be the last player remaining, excluding Mountebank/Outsider King.
